metadata.title: CVE-2021-28374 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Debian courier-authlib package before 0.71.1-2 for CourierAuthentication Library creates a /run/courier/authdaemon directory withweak permissions, allowing an attacker to read user information. This mayinclude a cleartext password in some configurations. In general, itincludes the user's existence, uid and gids, home and/or Maildir directory,quota, and some type of password information (such as a hash).

criterions.comment: courier-authlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
